speaker: Alma
dialogue: The desk you’re looking at right now is your workspace. It’s where you’ll do all of your card cutting.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: When we get an order in, we’ll tell you and give you a stack of card templates. A card template looks something like this.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Your stack of card templates are on the lower right hand side of the screen. When you begin a project, pull a card template off the stack by [clicking/tapping] and dragging it to your workspace. Try it!
